Text: Prophesies about the end of the world are a dime a dozen. The one in the Apocalypse is just as silly as the rest.
Then again, it's been 6k years since Adam, so we're at the end of the sixth "day", and the apocalypse happens right about then, before the 7th.

637 Mb, more easily-seeded version of same vid can be found at
